content_list.content:
The will-drafting process may be made much simpler with the help of Legal Zoom, which makes it straightforward to draft a valid document under the law and binds future generations.


This will-preparation program hosted in the cloud is one of the easiest and most user-friendly options currently available. Some competitors are more cost-effective; however, Legal Zoom offers an astounding array of assistance services.


Pros


+ Exceptional accessibility to help customers

+ Simple in its operation


Cons


- The most costly compared to its competitors


Key Specs


· Platform available online that is simple to utilize

· Affordable ongoing legal assistance

· The processing of VIPs is included in several LLC plans

· Excellent reputation among customers served

· Included in the package is a money-back guarantee


Since its founding in 1999, Legal Zoom has been operating with the mission of rendering inexpensive and accessible legal assistance to more people in the United States. By 2001, the firm had eleven products, one of which was software for estate planning. Since then, it has continued to develop at a quick pace right up to the current day and today claims to have about four million users all over the globe.


Legal Zoom is undoubtedly one of the greatest online will builders since they work with a network of independent lawyers who assist in developing their directory of papers. If you search online, you can locate it. The organization provides consumers interested in drafting a will with specialized bundles and three different degrees of help, ranging from fundamental preparation to an estate plan package that includes a year of legal consultation. Additionally, the organization provides one of the most comprehensive mobile applications for estate planning.


Cost


· Basic package: $89

· Comprehensive: $99

· Estate Plan Bundle: $179


When it comes to the creation of wills and other estate planning documents, Legal Zoom is one of the more expensive solutions available, especially when contrasted with other options like Law Depot. However, it does provide excellent customer assistance and is simple to use; in addition, the several levels provide users some leeway in determining the amount of money they are willing to pay for the service.


The Comprehensive and Estate Planning choices both feature estate-planning apps, legal consultations with a duration of thirty minutes, and attorney evaluations of the previously drafted Will. In addition, Legal Zoom provides stand-alone services, such as Powers of Attorney (starting at $35), Living Wills (starting at $39), and Living Trusts (starting at $279).


Products


The Basic package may be purchased for $89 and includes all the fundamentals necessary to draft a will. These fundamentals include a variety of useful instructional manuals that explain the pertinent provisions and declarations, as well as worksheets to assist in moving the process ahead.


Comprehensive Plan costs $99 and includes everything in the Basic plan and a trial of Legal Zoom's Attorney Advice for 14 days. This offers free telephone consultations with participating firms during regular business hours. Each consultation may last up to half an hour. However, there is a limit of one session per new legal case.


Estate Plan Bundle is available for $179. It includes everything in other plans, one year of attorney-related advice, the inclusion of documents related to Financial Power of Attorney, Living Will, and one year of unlimited revisions. The other plans will only allow modifications to a printed and digital version of the Will at least 30 days before the Will is printed.


Legal Zoom offers a variety of products. Legal Zoom products are software solutions that are hosted on the cloud and are all covered under the company's guarantee of $50,000. This guarantees that if any mistakes caused by their software could render an estate invalid, Legal Zoom will reimburse the amount stated to the estate of the deceased.



Document Creation


Legal Zoom's approach to document generation is among the industry's least complicated and user-friendly options. The whole creation process happens in the cloud, eliminating users' need to download and install any software. Users are guided through the process by answering extremely straightforward questions. In terms of ease of use and customer assistance, it is perhaps not quite as good as Quicken WillMaker & Trust, but it isn't too far behind either.


Service


The Comprehensive bundle and the Estate Plan Bundle include different degrees of Attorney Advice. These consultations come with the purchase of either package. In addition, anybody may use Legal Zoom's free online resource center whenever they want to. It contains a large number of articles that may assist in the explanation of the fundamentals of will preparation and all of the legal concerns that surround the process. These articles cover the majority of the aspects of estate planning.


Usability


People who want to write their wills and testaments will find that Legal Zoom is one of the easiest solutions to use among those now available. Because the software that Legal Zoom customers use is kept in the cloud, they may access their account from any device with an internet connection. Furthermore, the users do not need to install software on their personal computers to utilize the service. Customers who subscribe to Comprehensive Plan and the Estate Plan Bundle are eligible for a complimentary mobile application on their mobile devices.


The user is guided through the process in the manner of an interview by way of a series of questions, as is the case with most instances of will-preparation software. When using Legal Zoom, you may get your answers from several drop-down options, checklists, and text boxes that let you supply more information if required. Because of this, Legal Zoom has an exceptional amount of versatility, which is something that some of its rivals do not possess.


Legal Zoom guides users through the procedure step by step, making it simple enough for even those who have no prior experience to use it, particularly with the assistance of their dictionary of legal jargon. Legal Zoom does not provide a list of items that need to be gathered before beginning the process; rather, it does include worksheets that may be cross-referenced as the user moves through the steps.


After the procedure has been finished, there is a window of opportunity (even with the most basic version) to examine and make changes to the digital version before printing the final version and making it legally binding. When you purchase the Comprehensive edition or the Estate Plan Bundle, you can make changes to the actual copy.


Depending on the plan, the users may then prepare supporting documentation for caretakers, survivors, and other relevant parties. Support is offered by telephone and email, and, as was previously mentioned, both the Comprehensive and Estate Plan versions come with a half-hour consultation with an attorney. Since it was founded in 2001, Legal Zoom has been a member of the Better Business Bureau (BBB), which has awarded the company an outstanding "A+" rating.


Incorporation Services


Legal Zoom is another popular choice for companies interested in incorporating their enterprises. The formation of a C Corporation or an S Corporation is beneficial to enterprises. If you are unsure which option would be most suited to meet your requirements, the support staff at Legal Zoom is ready to provide you with individualized guidance.


Using Legal Zoom to incorporate your company is as straightforward as setting up a limited liability company. After you have responded to Legal Zoom's questions about your company and decided which package option you would like, Legal Zoom will handle everything else. The following is a list of the incorporation packages and prices offered by Legal Zoom:


· Economy: $149 plus state fees

· Standard: $329 plus state fees

· Express Gold: $349 plus state fees


Every plan comes with a check for the availability of company names, the preparation, and submission of incorporation paperwork, articles of incorporation, and lifetime customer support. In addition, they have a "next steps guide" and a peace of mind evaluation. In addition, a deluxe organizer, official documents and a seal, and accelerated processing are included in both the Standard and Express Gold packages for company formation.


If you are already planning to pay for the Standard plan, you may as well shell out the additional twenty dollars for the Express Gold package to take advantage of the speedy processing offered by the Secretary of State and the express shipping option. Once again, the amount of time it takes to complete the task is the primary distinction between the three strategies. It is sufficient to go with the Economy plan, which has a turnaround time of 30 days if you are not in a hurry to establish your firm. But if you are short on time, the Express Gold plan is the way to go since it offers quick processing.


Agent Services


Not getting around the fact that every company needs a registered agent. Registered agents are responsible for managing the reception of official correspondence on behalf of your company. This may include court paperwork (if you are served), official state mail, state tax notifications, notifications from the secretary of state, and notices about yearly reports. In other words, they assist your company in maintaining compliance with the regulations and ensure that it will never miss an essential filing date. The registered agent services provided by Legal Zoom begin at $299 per year and include the following in additions:


· Protection against identity theft costing $1,000,000 and credit monitoring

· Unlimited cloud storage for all of your essential company documents

· Access to the compliance calendar, which lists the important forthcoming deadlines.

· Coverage of administrative tasks and transaction costs when transferring from a rival RA


If you want to keep everything in order, it is a good idea to employ the same service provider to handle the creation of your firm and all of your registered agent requirements. As an additional enticement, Legal Zoom gives clients who create businesses the opportunity to get registered agent services for a reduced price of $249 for the first year of their company's existence. If, on the other hand, you are just interested in the registered agent services alone, you may discover more affordable bundles elsewhere.



How Legal Zoom Ranks


Legal Zoom is now regarded as one of the most reliable and high-quality online legal services. It is a trustworthy and dependable answer for a broad variety of distinct legal issues, including those about businesses, professionals, and private individuals.


Legal Zoom provides a comprehensive range of legal services, including company creation, registered agent services, trademark registrations, attorney consultations, and estate preparation. It is the most well-known and widely used of all the available online legal services, with a user base of over two million people.


It is important to note that certain of the services offered by Legal Zoom are more expensive than those offered by their rivals, notably regarding the provision of registered agent services. Therefore, if you are working with a smaller budget, you may want to think about exploring other places.


Would You Recommend Legal Zoom To A Friend?


Although it's possible that Legal Zoom isn't the most cost-effective option for will preparation on the market, the company still has a lot going for it. Customers have some choice and flexibility in meeting their financial obligations because of the three different price tiers. It is also one of the most straightforward software solutions we have evaluated, and the incredible level of flexibility built into the program (which is kept on the cloud and can be accessed from anywhere) is another selling point. The customer service is acceptable, and the inclusion of legal consultations with the two more costly plans is a valuable enhancement to the fundamental offering.
